info.title: Production Routing
info.description: A routing is a description of the operations (or steps in a process) that are performed to manufacture a product (or material). It is used as a reference for production orders, to run schedules and in calculating the costs of products.

x-sap-shortText: Use this synchronous inbound service to read, update and create production routing information

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
